com.cgoab.offline.util.resizer
Interface ResizerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageMagikResizerService
public interface ResizerService

Service to resize photos.

Method Summary
 int activeTasks()
          Returns the number of active (running & pending) resize tasks
 void addJobListener(JobListener listener)
           
 void cancelAll()
          Cancels all outstanding resize tasks.
 java.io.File getPhotoFolder()
           
 java.io.File getResizedPhotoFile(java.io.File photo)
          Returns the file path to the resized photo, or null if it does not exist.
 long purge()
           
 void removeAll(java.util.List<Photo> photos)
          Removes the given files from the service, this includes cancelling pending resize tasks in addition to removing any resized files from the cache.
 void removeJobListener(JobListener listener)
           
 void resizeAll(java.util.List<Photo> photos)
          Resizes the list of photos, if a photo in the list was already resized and the source file has not changed then nothing will be done.
